summary: My mod disables the No Skeleton Idle Sound you no the one when you summon a skeleton and does not stop, well no more yes
descriptionHtml:
My mod disables the No Skeleton Idle Sound you no the one when you summon a skeleton and does not stop, well no more yes but you will still hear it if he gets hit our attacks but they are two different sounds I plan on doing two different mods for that and a mod that has all 3 mods in one.

[b][u][size=4]How to Install[/size][/u][/b]

- To install this mod, simply download the main file and put the data folder in your Skyrim folder and replace the one there but I would recommend you [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/modmanager/]nexus mod manager[/url] or mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/6194]Organizer 2[/url]  I would say the best mod manager is [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/6194]Organizer 2[/url] so use that one but it is up to you then just down with mod manager


[b][u][size=4]UNINSTALL

[/size][/u][/b]To uninstall Just del the the esp less you are useing mod organizer or
nexus mod manger then just use the uninstall button with the program.

[b][size=4][u]BUG REPORTING[/u]

[/size][/b]Please let me know if you find any problems

[b][u][size=4]TOOLS USED[/size][/u][/b]

[url=http://store.steampowered.com/]G.e.c.k[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?]Mod Organizer[/url]

Thank you for downloading and testing this mod, I would really appreciate any feedback on this mod or any ideas for improvement.

[url=https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=HHZE6XQ7YEBZG]Please Donate
[/url]

All credit for this mod goes to:

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/users/2144664/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Markchill (Me)[/url]
